name: Rolemodelmaker.com
what_you_do: Clinical neuroscientist and inspirational speaker who supports, inspires, and empowers families and experts to step into their thrive and leave a legacy for the next generation.
who_you_serve: Families, parents, and experts working with children and youth.
social_proof: Voted twice as America's Top Doctors; clinical neuroscientist; international inspirational speaker; best-selling author; partnering with UNICEF.
signature_programs: Family Matters Mega Summit, Role Model Maker, The Amazing Parents Network, Family Circle, The Legacy Builders' Community, Foundation for Optimal Beginnings (nonprofit)
business_focus: Empowering families and experts to optimize children's performance and build lasting legacies through education, community, and events.
service_provided: Virtual summits, parenting programs, inspirational speaking, family coaching, nonprofit community development
